title: How to unsubscribe from Maczfit
description: Learn how to cancel your Maczfit subscription. Since cancellation options within the app may be limited, contacting customer support is recommended.

web.title: Unsubscribe via Website
web.description:
To cancel your Maczfit subscription via the website, follow these steps:

*   Go to the Maczfit official website: www.maczfit.pl.
*   Find the "Cennik" (Price List) section to review your current subscription details.
*   Access the contact form on the website.
*   Compose a cancellation request, including your subscription details.
*   Send the cancellation request via the contact form.
*   Alternatively, send an email to kontakt@maczfit.pl requesting cancellation.
*   Monitor your email for confirmation of cancellation from Maczfit.

app.title: Contact App Support
app.description:
If you are experiencing issues related to the Maczfit app, follow these steps:

*   Contact Maczfit app support via Google Play Store or Apple App Store if you have app-related issues.

seo_text: Cancel Maczfit subscription, Maczfit cancellation guide, unsubscribe from Maczfit, Maczfit customer support, Maczfit diet cancellation.
